resources.string: Grevena prefecture is famous for the variety of different kinds of mushrooms. You can go for hiking and collecting eatable or poisonous mushrooms.Αlways be sure before you eat because some kinds may lead to death.
One of the biggest and most beautiful ski centers in North Greece with 20km of pists for skiing. Suitable for novice or experienced skiers is also known as a Downhill bike park on spring and summer.

Valia Calda means Warm Valley. The park was established in 1966 and is considered one of the most important protected areas for the maintenance of mountainous biodiversity and ecosystem integrity at the national level.The national park is one of three areas in Greece that hosts a population of Eurasian brown bears (Ursus arctos arctos), which is considered a conservation priority species. The region itself is also called \"bear park\". Other large mammals that live in the park are lynxes, deers and wild cats, with the last two being found in the area of Flegga forest. Additionally wolves, beech martens, wild boars and red squirrels are present in the area all year round.

The stone bridges of Grevena are the largest and most impressive in Macedonia. In 1995, following pressure by the Prefecture of Grevena, the prefecture\'s bridges were declared listed monuments by the 11th Ephorate of Byzantine Antiquities of Veria.
The biggest tusk in the world is here. According to Guiness World Records the tusk found is 5.02m long. A 3.000.000 million years history in front of your eyes.
One of the toughest mountain running races in Greece. 33 kilometers around village Spilaio and Portitsa gorge.
Rafting and canoe kayak in Aliakmonas and Venetikos river. Pleasure is guaranteed.

Stylish, modern and spacious hotel offers the discerning traveler comfortable accommodation throughout the year. Surrounded by the majestic Pindos mountain range and only 2 kilometers from the center of Grevena, the Achillion was built to give guests a base to explore the outstanding natural beauty of the Grevena, Ioannina, Kastoria, Kozani, Larissa and Trikala prefectures.
Hotel Aigli since 1930 is one of the most historical buildings in Grevena. Many important moments of the city are linked with this hotel and its rooms. Totally renovated at 2004.
A three star hotel just in the right position. Clean rooms, free wifi, free parking, with a nice restaurant and a bar.
The most famous restaurant in the city center with many mushroom dishes
Τράπεζα των Γεύσεων - Trapeza ton Geuseon
Restaurant with local and many more dishes. Traditional music contemporary environment
Combine food and wine. Elegant dishes and a great variety of greek wines of high quality
Coffee, drinks and food all day. The best burger and club sandwich.
The Police Department of Grevena Prefecture
The Fire Department of Grevena Prefecture
Greek Rescue Team consisted of trained Volunteers
